text: 5.42: FG 9.22; 17.3Mbe kɨrar hegap, mbe rari tugɨratɨgap, mbe Fhe Bakɨme phena bɨna vhen verap, vhɨra mba gumgi gu mbigi phenin vov, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuav, Zisas bun mbe nzuav khaŋ nzuai, “Zisas, ana Fhe Bakɨme taagip kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav suaŋgiap farasarav sarigi guma ma.”
